name: CI/CD Pipeline (Local Deploy)

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:

jobs:
  lint-test-build-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    # 1. Checkout repo
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    # 2. Set up Python
    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: "3.10"

    # 3. Install dependencies
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt

    # 4. Lint with flake8
    - name: Run Linter
      run: |
        pip install flake8
        flake8 --max-line-length=120 .

    # 5. Run tests (pytest)
    - name: Run Tests
      run: |
        pip install pytest
        pytest tests/

    # 6. Log in to Docker Hub
    - name: Docker login
      uses: docker/login-action@v2
      with:
        username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
        password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}

    # 7. Build Docker image
    - name: Build Docker image
      run: |
        docker build -t ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/mlops:latest .

    # 8. Push Docker image
    - name: Push Docker image
      run: |
        docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/mlops:latest

    # 9. Run container locally on GitHub Actions runner
    - name: Run Docker container locally
      run: |
        docker run -d -p 8000:8000 --name mlops_app ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/mlops:latest
        echo "Waiting for API to start..."
        sleep 10
        curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/predict \
             -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
             -d '{"feature1": 5.1, "feature2": 3.5, "feature3": 1.4, "feature4": 0.2}'
